Member Attribute Documentation

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::atomic_type_match_for_non_modifiable_xact_check

For non-modifiable transactions with ARCACHE[1] == 1'b0 or AWCACHE[1] == 1'b0, the atomic_type should match between master transaction and corresponding slave transaction Enabled only when svt_axi_system_configuration :: master_slave_non_modifiable_xact_checks_enable is set in system configuration

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::burst_length_match_for_non_modifiable_xact_check

For non-modifiable transactions with ARCACHE[1] == 1'b0 or AWCACHE[1] == 1'b0, the burst_length should match between master transaction and corresponding slave transaction if burst_length <= 16. For larger burst lengths a transaction could get split if getting routed to an AXI interface that doesn't support burst length > 16. This check is not done when burst_length > 16. Enabled only when svt_axi_system_configuration :: master_slave_non_modifiable_xact_checks_enable is set in system configuration

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::burst_size_match_for_non_modifiable_xact_check

For non-modifiable transactions with ARCACHE[1] == 1'b0 or AWCACHE[1] == 1'b0, the burst_size should match between master transaction and corresponding slave transaction Enabled only when svt_axi_system_configuration :: master_slave_non_modifiable_xact_checks_enable is set in system configuration

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::burst_type_match_for_non_modifiable_xact_check

For non-modifiable transactions with ARCACHE[1] == 1'b0 or AWCACHE[1] == 1'b0, the burst_type should match between master transaction and corresponding slave transaction Enabled only when svt_axi_system_configuration :: master_slave_non_modifiable_xact_checks_enable is set in system configuration

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::cacheline_and_memory_coherency_check

Checks that if all cachelines are clean, the data in cacheline is consistent with data in memory This check is not performed if the agents connected to the interfaces are configured to work in passive mode.

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::cacheline_and_memory_coherency_check_per_xact

Checks that if all cachelines are clean, the data in cacheline is consistent with data in memory. This check is done on a per transaction basis at the end of each coherent transaction. Note that in some implementations a transaction to the memory could still be in the interconnect's buffer in which case this check would fail. Hence this check is issued as a warning, rather than an error. This check is not performed if the agents connected to the interfaces are configured to work in passive mode.

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::cache_type_match_for_non_modifiable_xact_check

For non-modifiable transactions with ARCACHE[1] == 1'b0 or AWCACHE[1] == 1'b0, the cache_type should match between master transaction and corresponding slave transaction, except for ARCACHE[0]/AWCACHE[0]. Enabled only when svt_axi_system_configuration :: master_slave_non_modifiable_xact_checks_enable is set in system configuration

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::coherent_and_snoop_data_match_check

Checks that data returned to initiating master matches the data received from snoop transaction

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::coherent_resp_isshared_check

Checks that the IsShared response to initiating master is correct

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::coherent_resp_passdirty_check

Checks that the PassDirty response to initiating master is correct

 svt_axi_system_checker::coherent_resp_start_conditions_check

Checks that the response to a coherent transaction is not started before sufficient information from snooped masters are obtained

 svt_axi_system_checker::coherent_snoop_domain_match_check

Checks that the port on which snoop transaction is received corresponds to the domain indicated in coherent transaction of initiating master

 svt_axi_system_checker::coherent_snoop_prot_type_match_check

Monitor Check that the security level (determined by signal ACPROT[1]) of the snoop transaction matches the security level of corresponding coherent transaction (determined by signal AxPROT[1])

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::coherent_snoop_type_match_check

Checks that the snoop transaction type corresponds to the coherent transaction type of initiating master

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::coherent_xact_with_no_snoop_check

Checks that READNOSNOOP,WRITENOSNOOP,WRITEBACK,WRITECLEAN and EVICT do not cause a snoop of cached masters

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::data_integrity_check

Applicable only when svt_axi_system_configuration :: posted_write_xacts_enable is not set. Checks that data in transaction is consistent with data in memory when the transaction completes. This checks that a WRITE transaction issued by a master is written to memory correctly. Similarly, it checks that a READ transaction fetches the correct data from memory. The check assumes that a transaction issued by a master completes only after response is received from the slave to which that transaction was routed. It also assums that there is no other transaction that accesses an overlapping address during the period that the response is issed by the slave and the transaction completes in the master that issued the transaction. In ACE, this check is issued only when the snoop has not returned any data and data is fetched from memory or when data is written to memory.

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::data_integrity_with_outstanding_coherent_write_check

Applicable only when svt_axi_system_configuration :: posted_write_xacts_enable is not set. Checks that the read data returned for a coherent read is the same as that of a WRITEBACK or WRITECLEAN transaction which was in progress when the read was initiated. This is to check that an interconnect that does speculative reads re-fetches the data in a scenario where the preceding WRITEBACK/WRITECLEAN did not complete and none of the snoops returned data. For example, consider that a WRITEBACK was in progress while a read is initiated by the master. If the interconnect does speculative reads, the speculative read may return stale data since the WRITEBACK is not complete. If none of the snoops return data as well, the interconnect should re-fetch data after the completion of the WRITEBACK.

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::device_non_bufferable_response_match_check

For device non-bufferable transactions, responses must be obtained from the final destination. Checks that the timing of the response of the master transaction is after that of the corresponding slave transaction and that the responses match. Enabled only when svt_axi_system_configuration :: master_slave_non_modifiable_xact_checks_enable is set in system configuration

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::eos_unmapped_master_xact

Applicable only when svt_axi_system_configuration :: posted_write_xacts_enable is set. At the end of the simulation if there are master transactions that could not be associated to corresponding slave transactions, this error is issued.

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::eos_unmapped_non_modifiable_xact

At the end of simulation there should be no non-modifiable transaction that hasn't been mapped to a slave transaction. If such a transaction exists it shows that a non-modifiable transaction hasn't been made visible at the slave, which is not allowed Enabled only when svt_axi_system_configuration :: master_slave_non_modifiable_xact_checks_enable is set in system configuration

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::exclusive_load_from_valid_state_sys_check

Checks that if cacheline is in invalid state then exclusive load transaction is issued only as READCLEAN or READSHARED

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::exclusive_snoop_propagation_check

Checks if interconnect stopped snoop propagation for exclusive transaction that was not successful

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::exclusive_store_from_valid_state_sys_check

Checks that if cacheline is in invalid state then exclusive store transaction is not issued

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::forward_cmos_to_slave_check

Checks that cache maintenance transactions are forwarded to slaves If two or more slaves are in the same address space of the memory map, this check is performed on each of the slave ports with overlapping address. The check is performed only if forward_cmos_to_slaves_check_enable is set in the port configuration of the slave

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::interconnect_dvm_complete_dvm_sync_association_check

Checks that a DVM Complete is received on the snoop channel only if the port has sent a DVM Sync on the read channel

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::interconnect_dvm_complete_issue_check

Checks that the interconnect issues a DVM complete to the master that issued the DVM Sync only after it receives a DVM Complete from each participating master.

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::interconnect_dvm_operation_snoop_transaction_association_check

Checks that interconnect sends a dvm operation on the snoop address channel of all participating components when it receives a dvm operation transaction from a component.

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::interconnect_dvm_response_timing_check

Checks that the interconnect collects the acknowledgements to DVM sent on snoop channel and responds to original DVM Sync. This check ensures that this acknowledgement is sent only after all snoop responses are received.

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::interconnect_dvm_response_value_check

Checks that the interconnect sets RRESP value of a DVM transaction correctly based on the following: The interconnect component gathers all response values and responds to the originator as follows: if CRRESP is 0b00000 for all responses, the interconnect component sets RRESP to 0b0000. If CRRESP is 0b00010 for any responses, the interconnect component sets RRESP to 0b0010.

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::interconnect_dvm_sync_snoop_transaction_association_check

Checks that interconnect sends a dvm sync on the snoop address channel of all participating components when it receives a dvm sync transaction from a component

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::master_dvm_complete_issue_check

Checks that a DVM Complete on the read address channel is issued after the handshake of the associated DVM Sync on the snoop address channel of the same master

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::master_dvm_no_data_transfer_check

Checks that no data is transferred for a DVM transaction

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::master_outstanding_dvm_sync_check

Checks that a component must have only one outstanding DVM Sync transaction. A component must receive a DVM Complete transaction before it issues another DVM Sync transaction

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::master_outstanding_snoop_dvm_sync_check

Checks that maximum number of outstanding DVM Sync messages that a master must be able to accept is 256. This check fires an error if the number of outstanding DVM Sync messages exceeds 256.

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::master_slave_xact_data_integrity_check

Checks that the data in a slave transaction is the same as that of the corresponding master transaction. In order to perform this check, slave transactions are correlated to corresponding master transactions. This check is done only when either of svt_axi_system_configuration :: master_slave_non_modifiable_xact_checks_enable, svt_axi_system_configuration :: posted_write_xacts_enable or svt_axi_system_configuration :: master_slave_xact_data_integrity_check_enable is set. When only the former is set, this check is done only on non-modifiable transactions. Note that posted_write_xacts_enable can be set only when there are no svt_axi_port_configuration :: AXI_ACE ports in the system. svt_axi_system_configuration :: master_slave_xact_data_integrity_check_enable may be set in systems with ACE components.

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::no_slave_respond_with_decerr_check

System monitor should ensure that each slave responds with DECERR if any transaction is routed to it with an address range that is not visible to it

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::no_two_cachelines_in_dirty_state_check

Checks that no two masters have the same cacheline in dirty state This check is not performed if the agents connected to the interfaces are configured to work in passive mode.

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::no_two_cachelines_in_unique_state_check

Checks that no two masters have the same cacheline in unique state This check is not performed if the agents connected to the interfaces are configured to work in passive mode.

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::ordering_for_non_modifiable_xact_check

For non-modifiable transactions with ARCACHE[1] == 1'b0 or AWCACHE[1] == 1'b0, transactions in the same direction to the same slave with the same ID, must be ordered irrespective of the address Enabled only when svt_axi_system_configuration :: master_slave_non_modifiable_xact_checks_enable is set in system configuration

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::outstanding_master_barrier_transaction_check

System monitor should ensure that an ACE master interface must not issue more than 256 outstanding barrier transactions

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::overlapping_addr_sequencing_check

Checks that if two masters access the same cache line, one master is sequenced after the other

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::prot_type_match_for_non_modifiable_xact_check

For non-modifiable transactions with ARCACHE[1] == 1'b0 or AWCACHE[1] == 1'b0, the prot_type should match between master transaction and corresponding slave transaction Enabled only when svt_axi_system_configuration :: master_slave_non_modifiable_xact_checks_enable is set in system configuration

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::region_match_for_non_modifiable_xact_check

For non-modifiable transactions with ARCACHE[1] == 1'b0 or AWCACHE[1] == 1'b0, the region should match between master transaction and corresponding slave transaction Enabled only when svt_axi_system_configuration :: master_slave_non_modifiable_xact_checks_enable is set in system configuration

 uvm_report_object  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::reporter

UVM report server passed in through the constructor

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::restart_exclusive_seq_post_cache_line_invalidation_check

Checks that an exclusive sequence is reset after a cacheline is invalidated by a snoop. This checks that after a snoop invalidates a cacheline, an exclusive load is always sent prior to sending the exclusive store.

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::slave_read_xact_timing_relative_to_last_posted_write_xact_check

Applicable only if svt_axi_system_configuration :: posted_write_xacts_enable is set. Checks that a READ transaction is routed to a slave only after a previous WRITE transaction from the same port and with an overlapping address completes at the slave. This is required in posted writes to ensure that a READ transaction retreives the same data as the previous WRITE transaction.

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::slave_transaction_routing_check

Checks that a transaction is routed correctly to a slave port based on address

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::snoop_addr_matches_coherent_addr_check

Checks that the address of a snoop transaction matches address of one of the outstanding coherent transactions. The VIP requires that svt_axi_port_configuration :: cache_line_size of ACE_LITE port type matches that of AXI_ACE port types. If cache line size of ACE_LITE and AXI_ACE ports does not match, this check would misfire.

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::snoop_data_consistency_check

Checks that data returned from all snoop transactions are consistent

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::snoop_not_sent_to_initiating_master_check

Checks that a snoop is not sent to the initiating master

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::snoop_resp_passdirty_check

Checks that no two responses to a snoop transaction have the PassDirty(CRRESP[2]) bit asserted

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::snoop_resp_wasunique_check

Checks that no two responses to a snoop transaction have the WasUnique(CRRESP[4]) bit asserted

 svt_err_check_stats  attribute
 svt_axi_system_checker::write_byte_count_match_across_interconnect

Checks that the effective number of bytes for write transactions sent by master components match that which are sent by the interconnect to the slaves. This basically checks for spurious writes from the interconnect. The effective write byte count is the number of bytes for which write strobe is asserted. If there are writes generated by the interconnect because dirty data returned by a snoop could not be passed back to a master, the effective write byte count includes the number of bytes in a snoop also.
